revise.description: Text for link to revise a changed idea

keep.description: Text for link to keep a changed idea

restoreAndRevise.description: Text for link to restore and revise a deleted idea

remove.description: Text for link to remove a deleted idea from the organizing space

readyToExplain.description: Text for the ready to explain button

saveResponse.description: Text for the save explanation response button

undoChanges.description: Text for the save explanation response button

organizingSpace_instructions.value: 這是您的組織空間，請將您的 {0} 拖移到這裡，以幫助您建立問題的回應或說明。
organizingSpace_instructions.description: Instructions to show when the idea organizing space is empty.

organizingSpace_explainInstructions.value: 若您已經組織想法完成 {0}, 請點選 "{1}"。
organizingSpace_explainInstructions.description: Text to display in the organizing space when the explanation feature is enabled.

constraint_mustCompleteExplainWarning.value: 您必須完成 {0} {1} 才能繼續進行，請在組織空間中依序排列 {2} ， 請選擇 "{3}" 並輸入答案，當您已完成，請選擇 "{4}"。
constraint_mustCompleteExplainWarning.description: Text to display when user tries to advance in the project before completing this Explanation Builder step

constraint_mustCompleteWarning.value: 您必須完成 {0} {1} 才能繼續進行，請在組織空間中依序排列 {2}。
constraint_mustCompleteWarning.description: Text to display when user tries to advance in the project before completing this Explanation Builder step (with explanation feature enabled)

ideaBasket_empty.value: 您的 {0} 是空的，請點選下方的  "{1}" 以新增{2}。
ideaBasket_empty.description: Text to display when idea basket is empty

ideaTableHeader.description: Header text for the ideas table

addIdea_title.description: Title text for the add new idea dialog/form

addIdea_textLabel.description: Label for the idea text input field in add or edit idea forms

addIdea_required.description: Message to display when a field is required in add or edit idea forms

editIdea_title.description: Title text for the edit idea dialog/form

reviseIdea_title.description: Title text for the revise idea dialog/form

restoreIdea_title.description: Title text for the revise & restore idea dialog/form

saveConfirmation.value: 儲存成功! 若您已完成，請繼續下一個 {0}。
saveConfirmation.description: Message to display when student has completed the step

unsavedChangesWarning.value: 警告: 您尚未儲存變更! 若您要儲存回應，請選擇 {0} 並按下 {1} 按鈕。 您確定不儲存就要離開嗎?
unsavedChangesWarning.description: Warning to display in confirmation dialog when user attempts to leave step without saving response

error_failedToRetrieveBasket.value: 錯誤訊息: 無法讀取 {0}!  您將無法進行 {1}，請重新整理 {1} 或重新開啟專題。

idea_title.description: Title/tooltip to display for ideas listed in the Explanation Builder

usedIdea_title.description: Title/tooltip to display for ideas used in the organizing space

editIdea_changeConfirm.value: 目前 {0} 用於以下的步驟:{1} 若您想變更 {2}, 您也將改變這些步驟的答案。

ideaChangedAlert.value: 因您在組織空間中新增{0}，故已 變更，您想如何做呢?
ideaChangedAlert.description: Text for alert box that appears when an idea being used in this Explanation Builder step has been modified in some way

ideaDeletedAlert.value: {0} 已被 刪除，您想如何做呢?
